mapper.select: select id, topic, description, cost, bill_time, cost_time, status, is_deleted from tb_bill, bill_user where userId = #{id} and billId = id and status = 1 order by bill_time;
select id, topic, description, cost, bill_time, cost_time, status, is_deleted from tb_bill, bill_user where userId = #{id} and billId = id and status = 0 order by bill_time;
